## SH.evalBasis() method

Evaluate SH basis for specific order

**Signature:**

```typescript
static evalBasis(direction: Vector3, order: number): number[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  direction | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | Direction to evaluate, must be normalized |
|  order | number | SH order |

**Returns:**

number\[\]

The SH basis evaluate at given direction
